pathAssistantSteps.info:
Preliminary review is completed. Go ahead and perform the following tasks


  1. Complete detailed review of the application
  2. Schedule Inspection
  3. Make sure the right action plan is assigned
  4. Add special instructions for the inspector if any

Violations are recorded during the Inspection. Make sure the following are taken care


  1. Review the Inspection findings
  2. Assign the violation type, compliance due date and priority of the violation
  3. Follow-up with the business owner to make sure the violations are addressed on time
  4. If the violations are not address on time, please take appropriate enforcement actions
Next review the Violations and approve the application

The application is submitted by the user. The following checks have to be done before moving the application to the next stage.


  1. Verify Required Attachments
  2. Verify Business Owner Details
